channel.title: Playing Chicken
channel.description:
So I was heading to Kroger( a corporate supermarket in the states), today and I saw this front row parking spot the other car could clearly see I was already near that spot and was actually turning in of all things. When the car of all items revs up like crazy and make about a 225 degree turn to quickly enter the spot when I was still turning in to get the spot.
Now I own a really nice 2003 Chevy Avalanche, it's a fairly big truck and I didn't want for it to get scratched so i didn't try to do anything to prevent it but still some people are just so rude. I mean I could understand if they were really in a hurry...but the guy in the other car took like five minutes to get out of the car so he apparently wasn't in a hurry.
Things like this just irritate me to no end. I just wanted to get that off of my chest.
:mad: :rolleyes:
